message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its unique value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $2,200,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value and my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but it falls significantly short of what I believe the product is worth. I'm willing to come down to $1,800,000. I believe this price point reflects both the product's value and my willingness to negotiate.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still think $1,200,000 is a more reasonable price. I'm willing to go up to $1,400,000, but I don't think I can go any higher than that.
